attributes.action: Stop allowing the English to be treated as the British underclass and cash cow to your native Scotland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Scottish are being subsidised by the English to receive better healthcare and education including; access to cancer drugs (denied to English),free medical prescriptions, free dental checks, free eye care, smaller primary classroom sizes, free university education and free elderly residential care through higher English taxes.  I demand equal rights for ALL British citizens.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
